id: Product Hunt Launch Press Kit Template (Notion)
name: Product Hunt Launch Press Kit Template (Notion)
description: The press kit contains everything that journalists and bloggers will require to cover your company/project in the press release.The press kit includes: Product details Back story/motivation Product highlights Services/products offered Media mentions Team bios Product images and videos Downloadable brand assets Awards received Testimonials Contact information FAQs Here's how it looks all together:All the information are presented in a beautiful format.
features: Product details; Back story/motivation; Product highlights; Services/products offered; Media mentions; Product images and videos; Downloadable brand assets; Awards received; Testimonials
